abstract.para: This is the manual for the SoCiA library.
SoCiA implements the CANopen protocol, focusing on control of servo motors.

sect1.title: CANopen
sect1.para: CANopen is a communications protocol for embedded automation systems. In the OSI network model, CANopen covers the network, transport, session, and presentation layers (3-6).

sect2.title: Object Dictionary
sect2.para: Each CANopen node has an Object Dictionary, used by the master to read and write values such a status codes, physical parameters, and commanded actions.
Dictionary entries are addressed with a 16-bit index and 8-bit subindex. The subindex is used for compound object, e.g., records and arrays, in order to access the individual elements of that object.
